document_data.mainbody:
einhar VII was a king of the Arkaiuns of Dambrath.
The man who would rule as Reinhar VII was the fourth son of King Reinhar VI. He was the father of Reinhar VIII.
Reinhar VII was born in the Year of the Telling Tome, 668 DR. He took his fathers throne and name upon the latters death in 691 DR. Reinhar VII died in 750 DR, passing the throne to his son.
